properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 20 at 1:07AM EST by NWS Albany NY
properties.description:
At 1 AM a band of lake effect snow was located from near Summit
and Middleburgh in Schoharie county to Westerlo in Albany county.
The band is drifting slowly south and will reach southern
Schoharie and southern Albany county by 2 AM. Localized
accumulations of around an inch may accumulate with this band,
especially over higher terrain.

Use extra caution if you must travel through this snow band. Rapid
changes in visiblity and potentially slick roads may lead to
accidents.

NWSheadline: A band of lake effect snow will bring light accumulations to portions of the Schoharie valley and Helderbergs through 2 AM
